name: Rhyme Time! Online Trivia | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: For example, if the clue to 1 was 'Sister reveals hard mineral' and 2 was 'Nobody carries 32 ounces', the answers would be 'Nun bares quartz' for 1 and 'None bears quarts' for 2. Don't use any punctuation in your answers, other than apostrophes, if needed. So here's your first member of a pair- remember, you'll also have to look at Question 2 to solve it!-Tibetan religious figure quotes military figure.
Remember, this one goes with number 1! South American camelid sees grain of corn.
Another pair. First member-Grizzly pursued small insect.

questions.correct: Burrows raze yew & burrows rase yew
questions.explanation: Burrows raze yew & burrows rase yew.
